parameters.name: MoveableDatumDirection
parameters.description: Moveable datum direction as defined in swMoveableDatumDirection_e

parameters.name: LockLeader
parameters.description: True to lock the leader, false to not

parameters.name: LockLeaderAngle
parameters.description: Angle of locked leader; valid only if LockLeader is set to true

parameters.name: GeometryRef
parameters.description: True to use a geometry reference, false to not; true is valid only if MoveableDatumDirection is set to swMoveableDatumDirection_e.swMoveableDatumDirectionBySelection

parameters.name: RefGeometryError
parameters.description: Reference geometry error as defined in swRefGeometryError_e

title: IDatumTargetSym.SetDatumTargetRotational
description: Sets this datum target to moveable rotational.
signature:
System.Boolean SetDatumTargetRotational( 
   System.Int32
MoveableDatumDirection
,
   System.Boolean
LockLeader
,
   System.Double
LockLeaderAngle
,
   System.Boolean
GeometryRef
,
   out System.Int32
RefGeometryError
)

parameters.name: MoveableDatumDirection
parameters.description: Moveable datum direction as defined in swMoveableDatumDirection_e

parameters.name: LockLeader
parameters.description: True to lock the leader, false to not

parameters.name: LockLeaderAngle
parameters.description: Angle of locked leader; valid only if LockLeader is set to true

parameters.name: GeometryRef
parameters.description: True to use a geometry reference, false to not; true is valid only if MoveableDatumDirection is set to swMoveableDatumDirection_e.swMoveableDatumDirectionBySelection

parameters.name: RefGeometryError
parameters.description: Reference geometry error as defined in swRefGeometryError_e

returns: True if datum target successfully set, false if errors
remarks: If GeometryRef is set to true, then select a geometry reference before calling this method.
